0.1.0.name: lens-syntax
0.1.0.description: Lens Syntax is a dark syntax theme designed for legibility and focus

readme:
# LENS SYNTAX The Lens Syntax Theme is written by Oliver Grayson, designed for focused workflow and legibility. Python, JavaScript, HTML, and other popular languages have specific stylesheets for a more cohesive appearance. ## Installation Install the LENS SYNTAX theme through Atom by navigating to ***Preferences/Settings > Install*** and search for Lens Syntax Theme under 'Themes', or install it through the CLI
`apm install lens-syntax` ## Feedback Feel free to let me know your thoughts on the theme, or alert me of any issues by contacting me on Github.
